properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 9 at 3:15PM PST until January 11 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
...HEAVY SNOW FRIDAY...

.A potent winter storm will move into the Inland Northwest
Friday. Light snow will begin in the morning hours on Friday with
snow fall increasing Friday afternoon and night.

* WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 17
inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph.

* WHERE...Anatone, Peola, Mountain Road, and Cloverland Road.

* WHEN...From 10 AM Friday to 4 PM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible.
Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM FRIDAY TO 4 PM PST SATURDAY
